ğŸ—¡ Github Actionsìœ¼ë¡œ ìë™ë°°í¬

dev ë¸Œëœì¹˜ì— í‘¸ì‹œë¥¼ í•˜ë©´ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°°í¬ë˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ëª©í‘œì´ë‹¤.

  • ê¸°ì¡´ ë§Œë“  ê²ƒì´ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ Regenerate tokení•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

Settings -> Secret -> Secrets -> New repository secret ê°€ì„œ Tokenì„ ë“±ë¡í•˜ë„ë¡ í•˜ì.

  • Githubì—ì„œ Envë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©ëœë‹¤ê³  ìƒê°í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.
  • ë‚˜ê°™ì€ ê²½ìš° KeyëŠ” TOKEN, Valueì— í† í°ì„ ë³µì‚¬í–ˆë‹¤.

Actions -> set up a workflow yourself ê°€ì„œ main.yml íŒŒì¼ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì.

name: Deploy Project
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - dev
jobs:
  update:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@master
      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@master
        with:
          node-version: 12.x
      - name: Cache node_modules
        uses: actions/cache@v1
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: ${{runner.OS}}-build-${{hashFiles('**/yarn.lock')}}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.OS }}-build-${{ runner.OS }}-
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: yarn install --prod --pure-lockfile

      - name: Build
        run: yarn run build
        env:
          NODE_ENV: production
      - name: Deploy
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v2.5.0
        env:
          PERSONAL_TOKEN: ${{secrets.TOKEN}}
          PUBLISH_BRANCH: gh-pages
          PUBLISH_DIR: ./public
          SCRIPT_MODE: true
